title: 指令？
author: moses-minecraft
txt_content:
execute @e[type=ArmorStand,name=fn] ~ ~ ~ /testfor @p[r=1] {Inventory:[{id:bedrock,tag:{display:{Name:"Villager_Spawner"}}}]}


有什么错
？
显示failed to execute

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
execute @e[type=ArmorStand,name=fn] ~ ~ ~ /testfor @p[r=1] {Inventory:[{id:minecraft:bedrock,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"Villager_Spawner"}}}]}

Damage和Count是必须加入的NBT，不然指令无效，还有物品前面一点要加minecraft:XXX
